Test Case Description: Verify that the payment amount is displayed correctly and is editable if partial payments are allowed.
Pre-Conditions: User has clicked Pay Now and is redirected to the Payment Gateway page.
Test Steps:
1. Open the Payment Gateway page.
2. Verify the payment amount displayed in the Amount to Pay field.
Expected Result: Payment amount is displayed correctly and is editable if partial payments are allowed.

Test Case Description: Verify that the user can select between saved payment methods or add a new method via the payment method drop-down.
Pre-Conditions: User has clicked Pay Now and is redirected to the Payment Gateway page.
Test Steps:
1. Open the Payment Gateway page.
2. Select a payment method from the drop-down menu or add a new one.
Expected Result: User can select a payment method or add a new one without issues.

Test Case Description: Verify that the user can enter valid credit/debit card details including cardholder name, card number, expiry date, and CVV.
Pre-Conditions: User has clicked Pay Now and is redirected to the Payment Gateway page.
Test Steps:
1. Open the Payment Gateway page.
2. Enter valid credit/debit card details in the respective fields.
Expected Result: Credit/debit card details are accepted and validated correctly.

Test Case Description: Verify that the billing address field is auto-populated with the customerâ€™s address and can be edited if necessary.
Pre-Conditions: User has clicked Pay Now and is redirected to the Payment Gateway page.
Test Steps:
1. Open the Payment Gateway page.
2. Verify that the billing address is auto-populated and can be edited.
Expected Result: Billing address is auto-populated and can be edited if needed.

Test Case Description: Verify that the Pay Now button is functional and submits the payment.
Pre-Conditions: User has clicked Pay Now and is redirected to the Payment Gateway page.
Test Steps:
1. Open the Payment Gateway page.
2. Fill in the required payment details.
3. Click on the Pay Now button.
Expected Result: Pay Now button submits the payment and redirects to the confirmation page.

Test Case Description: Verify that the payment confirmation page is displayed with the correct details after successful payment.
Pre-Conditions: User has clicked Pay Now and is redirected to the Payment Gateway page.
Test Steps:
1. Complete a payment.
2. Verify the payment confirmation page is displayed after successful payment.
Expected Result: Payment confirmation page is displayed with correct details.

Test Case Title / Name: Verify Transaction ID and Payment Date on Confirmation
Test Case Description: Verify that the Transaction ID, Date of Payment, and Amount Paid are displayed correctly on the confirmation page.
Pre-Conditions: User has clicked Pay Now and is redirected to the Payment Gateway page.
Test Steps:
1. Complete a payment.
2. Review the confirmation page for correct Transaction ID, Date of Payment, and Amount Paid.
Expected Result: Transaction ID, Date of Payment, and Amount Paid are displayed accurately.

Test Case Title / Name: Verify Payment Failure Scenario and Error Handling
Test Case Description: Verify that if the payment fails (e.g., due to insufficient funds), an appropriate error message is displayed.
Pre-Conditions: User has clicked Pay Now and is redirected to the Payment Gateway page.
Test Steps:
1. Attempt a payment with insufficient funds or an invalid card.
2. Verify that the correct error message is displayed.
Expected Result: An appropriate error message is displayed if the payment fails due to insufficient funds or invalid card details.

Test Case Description: Verify that the Cancel button allows the user to return to the previous page without making a payment.
Pre-Conditions: User has clicked Pay Now and is redirected to the Payment Gateway page.
Test Steps:
1. Open the Payment Gateway page.
2. Click on the Cancel button.
3. Verify that the user is returned to the previous page.
Expected Result: Cancel button works and returns the user to the previous page without processing a payment.

Test Case Title / Name: Verify Download Receipt Button on Confirmation
Test Case Description: Verify that the Download Receipt button is functional and allows the user to download the receipt for a successful payment.
Pre-Conditions: User has clicked Pay Now and is redirected to the Payment Gateway page.
Test Steps:
1. Complete a successful payment.
2. Click the Download Receipt button and verify the receipt is downloaded successfully.
Expected Result: Download Receipt button works and the receipt is downloaded successfully.
